title: Does cupping break the fast? | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: malika's part of the question is copying what's the ruling of cupping for a person who's fasting and it's an issue of dispute the most authentic opinion it is not recommended but it does not affect your fasting unless one faints or feels really tired and we and sick out after doing it in this case he has to break his fast but the most authentic opinion that it does not break your fast
